message:
"Any fool can write code that a computer can understand.
Good programmers write code that humans can understand."
Marin Fowler,

"Now go out there and clean up your code! If your code is already clean, give yourself a pat on the back and ask yourself how you can improve it! Be sure to let me know what clean code means to you, and how you go about writing the cleanest code possible!"
zach wills,

"We love to live if we are happy,
Clean code will make u to be very happy, at this moment u will love the life"
M.Abdelghffar,
story: Mostafa Abdelghffar shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: The importance of clean code | Zach Wills
caption: zachwills.net
description: Have you ever heard the saying "code is poetry"? Probably. I think every engineer has heard that phrase before. I have known it for a long time, and I thought I knew what it meant. It wasn't until sometime relatively recently (within the past year) that I really started to understand what it meant. …

data.message:
هو فى نقطتين
الاولى : ان محدش هيسيبك تكتب كود نضيف انت واخد المشروع ملعبك وعليك تاسك وهتكتب فين كود نضيف, هتلعبك وخلاص خصوصاً لو كان في ضغط الوقت ومينفعش تعمل كل حاجه من الاول

النقطة التانية : انك بمجرد ما تتعلم تكتب كود نضيف وتجربها مره في التانية, مش هتعرف تكتب كود ملعبك :)
